Name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Fall of the House of Usher Collector's Edition
About the game: You and your colleague, Detective Dupin, have accepted an odd case at the ancient House of Usher – to find the twin sister of Roderick, who has vanished without a trace. As you delve deeper into the mystery, the connection between the twin’s malady and the old estate appears even more entwined. Why are townspeople disappearing? What secret is locked in the forbidden library? And can you and Dupin find the answers before more innocent victims are claimed? This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version. The Collector’s Edition includes: Play the bonus game to uncover more mysteries Use the available Strategy Guide Earn Achievements Purchase collectible items for your exam room Get wallpapers, soundtracks, and concept art
